org.opentcs.access.rmi.factories

类 AnonSslSocketFactoryProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.access.rmi.factories.AnonSslSocketFactoryProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SocketFactoryProvider
    已过时。 
    Use SecureSocketFactoryProvider instead.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public class AnonSslSocketFactoryProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements SocketFactoryProvider
    Provides instances of SslRMIClientSocketFactory and SslRMIServerSocketFactory. Other than their default implementations the factories provided here not only support, but also enable anonymous cipher suites (and only anonymous cipher suites). This is necessary for RMI (with SSL) when there's no keystore on the server-side and no truststore on the client-side.

      • getAnonymousCipherSuites

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String[] getAnonymousCipherSuites()
        已过时。 
        Returns an array of anonym cipher suits supported by the default SSLContext or null, if accessing the default SSLContext fails.

        SslRMIClientSocketFactory and SslRMIServerSocketFactory and therefore AnonSslClientSocketFactory and AnonSslServerSocketFactory use the default SSLContext to create SSL sockets (unless it is set explicitly). The default SSLContext is therefore used to access the supported chipher suites and filter the anonym ones.

        Note: Getting the default SSLContext only works, if the system properties for keystore and truststore are not set or if they are set and the corresponding files exist.
        返回:
        An array of anonym cipher suits supported by the default ssl context or null, if accessing the default SSLContext fails.
